9thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Foresight
9thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature and bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future.

9thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Shapechange
9thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You assume the form of a different creature for the duration.

9thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Storm of Vengeance
9thLevelDruidSpells.Description: A churning storm cloud forms, centered on a point you can see and spreading to a radius of 360 feet.

9thLevelDruidSpells.Name: True Resurrection
9thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years and that died for any reason except old age.
